>
[Effortless Concentration](/Feats.aspx?ID=206) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 72 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 103 <sup>4.0</sup>, [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
Your turn begins.

</column>

---

You maintain a spell with hardly a thought. You immediately gain the effects of the Sustain a Spell action, allowing you to extend the duration of one of your active class spells.
